results.title: Poetry for fun: trulier coolier
results.brief_description: This film features eight poems, chosen by children and dealing with what children do, what they think about, and how they feel about their world. Included are animated cartoons, giant puppets, creative photography and music. Suitable for lower and upper primary levels.
results.description: This film features eight poems, chosen by children and dealing with what children do, what they think about, and how they feel about their world. Included are animated cartoons, giant puppets, creative photography and music. Suitable for lower and upper primary levels.

results.title: Ploughing by steam
results.creator_credit: John Rogers and Steam Plough Club
results.brief_description: Steam engines are no longer used for ploughing, but this film shows such machinery at work in ploughing, cultivating, mole draining, dredging, and the special operation of moving a barn. Steam engines are costly to run, and have been replaced by tractors, but the Steam Plough Club is keeping the traditions alive.

results.title: Plaza = The Beach
results.creator_credit: Edward Sturlis, Andrzej Jozwikiewicz and Studio Malych Form Filmowych Se-Ma-For
results.brief_description: Two cheeky tattoos escape from the chests of two sailors to wreak havoc on unsuspecting sunbathers, returning when the pace of their pranks gets out of hand. A comic short film, effectively combining real life with animation.

results.title: Playing with fire
results.creator_credit: Frank Cantor, Christopher Knight and National Fire Protection Association. Public Affairs Division
results.brief_description: Two children take some matches from home and set fire to a truck, which in the process of exploding burns them both badly. A doctor explains that dangers should be explained to children as so often in the domestic situation children are put at risk when with care and commonsense these can be avoided.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Frank Cantor, Christopher Knight and National Fire Protection Association. Public Affairs Division

results.title: Platinum
results.brief_description: Presents the history of platinum; examines its chemical properties such as stability and catalysis; and shows how it is processed. Suitable for upper secondary level.

results.title: Plant nurturing
results.brief_description: Select the correct answer and nurture the plant. The longer it takes for you to give the right answers, the longer it takes for the plant to grow. An interactive game.

results.title: Planning for survival: world conservation strategy
results.brief_description: In 1980, a document on the World Conservation Strategy was published which identified goals to be implemented if the world was to survive. This video presentation outlines each goal and suggests solutions. Presents teachers with a good biological model. No other credits available.

results.title: Planning for school effectiveness: program budgeting
results.brief_description: Explains school-based program budgeting using detailed examples of the highly effective approach at Rosebery District High School, Tasmania. Considers policy making and planning community and staff involvement, management of conflict, building consensus, and evaluation. No other credits available.
